How do i change the language? I dont wanna play this game on Russian texts
try editing the steam_xx.ini on "gamedir"BinariesWin32. put "english" on the Language line.

Theres no steam_xx.ini  on"gamedir"BinariesWin32. pls help.. cant change the language
works for me... but only one question how do i change the language to english? Please help...

to vhange lang. to Egglish just go to :
BinariesWin32steam_rld.ini

open with Notepad and change the Russian to English like this >

[Settings]
UserName=RLD!
Language=English
